condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Existence of multidisciplinary measures for reducing school dropout rates, including by preventing adolescent pregnancies and violence in school and engaging community-based support

description.narrative: Strengthened capacities of the enrollment teams; continued support for promoting access to education for Roma adolescent girls; innovative education model for improving learning outcomes scaled up to 119000 students; a national programme on prevention of violence in schools was developed by an expert group in the MES; 46 600 school aged children from a total of 367 schools involved in World Largest Lesson Initiative promoting action to support SDGs; development of a child rights framework curriculum, teaching and learning materials and teachers' training program initiated. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:19/12/2019
